actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Star Print ordered on the bill.

official_title: A bill to provide for the extension of the Farmers Home Administration program under section 515 of the Housing Act of 1949 and other programs relating to housing and community development.
short_title: Section 515 Rural Multifamily Housing Program Extension Act of 1995

summary.text: Section 515 Rural Multifamily Housing Program Extension Act of 1995 - Amends the Housing Act of 1949 with respect to rural housing to extend set-asides for: (1) targeted underserved areas and colonias; and (2) rental housing funds for nonprofit entities. Repeals loan insurance authority for rural rental housing for elderly or handicapped persons and families or moderate income persons and families. Extends temporarily expiring section 8 contract authority. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Section 515 Rural Multifamily Housing Program Extension Act of 1995
A bill to provide for the extension of the Farmers Home Administration program under section 515 of the Housing Act of 1949 and other programs relating to housing and community development.
